ingredients: 1 pound fresh or frozen medium shrimp, peeled and deveined

12 6-inch corn tortillas (Although I had some corn tortillas in the fridge, I tried one corn tortilla, but ended up using the flour tortillas – we just don’t like the texture of the corn ones. David thought that the flour tortillas let the ingredients have more flavor and didn’t take away from them .)
1 teaspoon finely chopped canned chipotle pepper in adobo sauce
